name: @kelsny/synth
description: A tool for synthesizing types into runtime validators.

scripts.ext:syntaxes: tsc scripts/syntaxes.ts --moduleResolution node --module esnext --target esnext && (node scripts/syntaxes.js || rm scripts/syntaxes.js)  && rm scripts/syntaxes.js
scripts.meta:lc: tsc scripts/linecount.ts --moduleResolution node --module esnext --target esnext && (node scripts/linecount.js || rm scripts/linecount.js) && rm scripts/linecount.js
